story:
Why THIS book?

When I turned 40, I went into a depression and couldn't seem to get my head wrapped around all of the things that I had wanted to do with my life...but just hadn't gotten to yet. 

Don't get me wrong, I have 2 wonderful children and a loving husband, but I was lost in my own thoughts of failure.

I wanted to write and I hadn't done it; didn't know how to do  it; or even how to start.

When I finally sat down and did it, I found out how wonderful it truly was to actually get the thoughts and ideas out of my head and onto paper. That would have been enough, but I went ahead and self-published on Amazon and took it even further to other book selling platforms. 

A little over a year later, I have written nearly 40 books, published about 30 and enjoy a clear mind and the knowledge that I CAN write any book I want to ANY TIME I want to.

I am sharing that with others who may be going through what I went through (whether you are 40, 20, 60, or any other age):

  • From Blank Page to Best Seller in Six Steps  will walk you through each phase of writing and publishing your book.
  • Combine that with my workbook Just Get the Darn Book Started which will present you with quick and thought-provoking exercises to get your ideas out of your head and onto paper.
  • These 2 books alone will help anyone; but I am not stopping there...


Support of the System

I am requested support for various aspects of my program. As you can see above, I am truly focused on helping aspiring writers (or even just blocked writers) to achieve his or her true potential as a published author (or just to get those pesky ideas out of your head).

The entire program that I am developing only starts with the book and workbook mentioned above.

Here are the other aspects that I am working on:

  • Bestseller Breakthrough Brainstorming Program (one of the perks!!!): This is a 45-minute session with me in which we develop your unique mind map portraying what your niche is and detailing various ways in which you can corner your own niche topic with various books and products.

  • Two Telecourses (Nuances of Non Fiction & Faces of Fiction): Each of these courses will cover everything from outlining, to writing, to distribution and publishing, to marketing and promotion. They will span 5 weeks including a Q&A call with a 6th Bonus Call on an additional relevant and timely topic. These classes will be about 75-minutes/class and participants will be given assignments in order to move him or her forward in the process. If you contribute at this perk level, you get a free ticket to not only one, but both telecourses AND membership in private Facebook and LinkedIn Groups.

  • Cover to Cover in 45 and Published & Promoted in 90: These are private programs in which I work one-on-one with a writer. The 45-day session will get a book completely written, edited, proofread, designed, and laid out. The next 45 days will cover the publishing and promotion aspect of the process. These are also available as perks if you would like to work with me one-on-one. 

Where the Funds Will Go?

I want you to understand exactly where the funds will be going so you can feel comfortable with contributing to this campaign and confident in the perks that you will receive according to your contribution. 

  • First and foremost, I will hire a full-time virtual assistant. I do not want anything to slip through the cracks and this program is extremely important to me so I will find and hire the "right" person to keep things organized and my projects on target. If at all possible, I would also like to bring on a part-time bookkeeper.

  • Putting the writing resources library together will take some time and resources. I intend for this library to be included for anyone who has invested in themselves to get moving on their dreams. This will be included for those in the telecourses or in the one-on-one coaching programs. I may make it available to others for a nominal fee as I intend to add resources to it on a monthly basis.

  • BackEnd Programs and Platforms will be next. I would love to be able to manage these things on my own, but I know that it's not possible and it would be unfair to those who have invested in themselves and me to not offer the highest level of service. I will be setting up a scheduling program to manage appointments (Bestseller Breakthrough Brainstorming Sessions as well as the 45-day and 90-day one-on-one weekly sessions); a platform for sharing documents and assignments; Instant Teleseminar (for the telecourses...or something similar to that caliber); Recording Program for all of the telecourse classes and Brainstorming Sessions; and other programs and processes that become necessary.

  • A website capable of handling this level of programs and processes. Both the hosting and programming will be invested in with campaign contributions.
As you can see, I have put a lot of thought into this as I want to be able to offer the highest level of service and expertise to anyone and everyone who invests in my campaign and in themselves.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are able to contribute, I am incredibly grateful. If you are an aspiring writer, I am thrilled to have the opportunity to work with you and support you in your endeavors.

If you are not a writer, but know of anyone who could benefit from this campaign, please share this link with them. Some of those would include:

  • Business Owners/Entrepreneurs (it is amazing how much an ebook or report can increase brand awareness and visibility)
  • Students who might need to work on a thesis or report
  • Sales professionals (again, a free report can open doors in ways that nothing else can)
  • Mothers/Fathers (want to write a book for your kids? I did and it was great!)
  • Anyone interested in documenting their own family history
  • Anyone who has a writing talent, but hasn't put it into this format yet (I started out as a copywriter so you never know.)
  • everyone who you feel may benefit from journaling thoughts or fantasies
There are many ways to get the word out:
  • Email
  • Social Media
  • Indiegogo share tools


Thank you in advance for your help with my campaign. I am looking forward to mentoring and guiding as many aspiring writers as I can and your funds and well wishes will help me in ways that I can't even describe.
story_txt:
Why THIS book?When I turned 40, I went into a depression and couldn't seem to get my head wrapped around all of the things that I had wanted to do with my life...but just hadn't gotten to yet. Don't get me wrong, I have 2 wonderful children and a loving husband, but I was lost in my own thoughts of failure.I wanted to write and I hadn't done it; didn't know how to do  it; or even how to start.When I finally sat down and did it, I found out how wonderful it truly was to actually get the thoughts and ideas out of my head and onto paper. That would have been enough, but I went ahead and self-published on Amazon and took it even further to other book selling platforms. A little over a year later, I have written nearly 40 books, published about 30 and enjoy a clear mind and the knowledge that I CAN write any book I want to ANY TIME I want to.I am sharing that with others who may be going through what I went through (whether you are 40, 20, 60, or any other age):

From Blank Page to Best Seller in Six Steps  will walk you through each phase of writing and publishing your book.
Combine that with my workbook Just Get the Darn Book Started which will present you with quick and thought-provoking exercises to get your ideas out of your head and onto paper.
These 2 books alone will help anyone; but I am not stopping there...
Support of the SystemI am requested support for various aspects of my program. As you can see above, I am truly focused on helping aspiring writers (or even just blocked writers) to achieve his or her true potential as a published author (or just to get those pesky ideas out of your head).The entire program that I am developing only starts with the book and workbook mentioned above.Here are the other aspects that I am working on:

Bestseller Breakthrough Brainstorming Program (one of the perks!!!): This is a 45-minute session with me in which we develop your unique mind map portraying what your niche is and detailing various ways in which you can corner your own niche topic with various books and products.


Two Telecourses (Nuances of Non Fiction & Faces of Fiction): Each of these courses will cover everything from outlining, to writing, to distribution and publishing, to marketing and promotion. They will span 5 weeks including a Q&A call with a 6th Bonus Call on an additional relevant and timely topic. These classes will be about 75-minutes/class and participants will be given assignments in order to move him or her forward in the process. If you contribute at this perk level, you get a free ticket to not only one, but both telecourses AND membership in private Facebook and LinkedIn Groups.


Cover to Cover in 45 and Published & Promoted in 90: These are private programs in which I work one-on-one with a writer. The 45-day session will get a book completely written, edited, proofread, designed, and laid out. The next 45 days will cover the publishing and promotion aspect of the process. These are also available as perks if you would like to work with me one-on-one. 

Where the Funds Will Go?I want you to understand exactly where the funds will be going so you can feel comfortable with contributing to this campaign and confident in the perks that you will receive according to your contribution. 
First and foremost, I will hire a full-time virtual assistant. I do not want anything to slip through the cracks and this program is extremely important to me so I will find and hire the "right" person to keep things organized and my projects on target. If at all possible, I would also like to bring on a part-time bookkeeper.

Putting the writing resources library together will take some time and resources. I intend for this library to be included for anyone who has invested in themselves to get moving on their dreams. This will be included for those in the telecourses or in the one-on-one coaching programs. I may make it available to others for a nominal fee as I intend to add resources to it on a monthly basis.


BackEnd Programs and Platforms will be next. I would love to be able to manage these things on my own, but I know that it's not possible and it would be unfair to those who have invested in themselves and me to not offer the highest level of service. I will be setting up a scheduling program to manage appointments (Bestseller Breakthrough Brainstorming Sessions as well as the 45-day and 90-day one-on-one weekly sessions); a platform for sharing documents and assignments; Instant Teleseminar (for the telecourses...or something similar to that caliber); Recording Program for all of the telecourse classes and Brainstorming Sessions; and other programs and processes that become necessary.

A website capable of handling this level of programs and processes. Both the hosting and programming will be invested in with campaign contributions.

As you can see, I have put a lot of thought into this as I want to be able to offer the highest level of service and expertise to anyone and everyone who invests in my campaign and in themselves.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you are able to contribute, I am incredibly grateful. If you are an aspiring writer, I am thrilled to have the opportunity to work with you and support you in your endeavors.If you are not a writer, but know of anyone who could benefit from this campaign, please share this link with them. Some of those would include:
Business Owners/Entrepreneurs (it is amazing how much an ebook or report can increase brand awareness and visibility)
Students who might need to work on a thesis or report
Sales professionals (again, a free report can open doors in ways that nothing else can)
Mothers/Fathers (want to write a book for your kids? I did and it was great!)
Anyone interested in documenting their own family history
Anyone who has a writing talent, but hasn't put it into this format yet (I started out as a copywriter so you never know.)
everyone who you feel may benefit from journaling thoughts or fantasies
There are many ways to get the word out:
Email
Social Media
Indiegogo share tools
Thank you in advance for your help with my campaign. I am looking forward to mentoring and guiding as many aspiring writers as I can and your funds and well wishes will help me in ways that I can't even describe.

story:
Sometimes the Present You're Given, is a Much Bigger Gift. 

Hi! I'm Valerie Williams-Sanchez, writer, author and Auntie behind the children's tale Isaiah and the Chocolate Mountain. It is a story we'd like to publish, to bring to you and young readers, alike. 

The story goes like this: Isaiah’s birthday goes terribly wrong when Auntie gives him the one thing he loathes — chocolate! Disappointed and angry, Isaiah storms out of the house and into an adventure. In the end, Isaiah learns just how resourceful he can be, and how much his Auntie loves him. 

The story is one I created and told my nephew Isaiah one day while babysitting. It is a whimsical tale of challenges met, and happy endings. 

Written to be read aloud, with vibrant, folk art-inspired illustrations, this book is a fun read — particularly for anyone who's ever received a birthday gift they didn't like! 

But, we need your help to get this sweet story published and into the hands — and hearts — of young readers...

 

Isaiah and the Chocolate Mountain (c) 2014 All Rights Reserved. Valerie Williams-Sanchez, Valorena Online, L.L.C., P.O. Box 180, Palisades, NY  10964.


What We Need & What You Get

I've made the initial investments of time, money and effort to write the book, commission and manage the illustration process, and to develop the project to this point. 

Now with your donation, toward the overall goal of $10,000, we will finish and  fund:

~ Image, text and design treatments

~ Production 

~ Post-publication 

~ Printing  

~ Marketing 

~ Promotion   


You will get the following for your donation: 

$20 — Facebook Thanx!

$75 — ICM Digital Poster Thanx!

$150 — Cocoa Rocks From the Chocolate Mountain Thanx!

$250 — ICM Book, First Run Edition Copy Thanx!

$500 — ICM Dedication, In-Book Listing Thanx!

Regardless of whether we reach 100% of our funding goal this time around, 100% of your donation will go toward expenses to publish and market this book.


The Impact -- Why Isaiah and the Chocolate Mountain Matters

Today, roughly 37% of the U.S. population are people of color. However, according to data published by Lee & Lowe Books, over the past 18 years, less than 10% of children's books published feature multicultural content. Yes, that's correct, less than 10% of the books are written with children of color in mind.

Isaiah and the Chocolate Mountain looks to affect that!

The story features:

~ Out-loud reading-friendly text 

~ Colorful, hand-drawn artwork

~ Multi-cultural main character

~ Multi-generational family featured

All of these features benefit children of every hue of the spectrum. And, this project needs your help!


Risks & Challenges

Without this funding, this project will NOT be completed.


Other Ways You Can Help:

Please help spread the word! Use the Indiegogo share tools to show your friends.

story:
Who Is Jungle Svonni?

Jungle Svonni is an incredible and inspiring man. He is a Sami from Sapmi (Lapland), and he is one of last genuine Shaman practicing within the Sami culture, where shamanism was once an integral part. Jungle has navigated an extraordinary life that spans the ice flows of Northern Greenland to a decade in the Peruvian Amazon. His life’s journey has been to continue his family’s ancestral tradition of Shamanism and healing, and to resurrect the Sami culture, decimated by persecution in Sweden.

Because Jungle has been caught up in an unjust circle of circumstances initiated by the Swedish Customs Authority and followed through right up the Swedish High Court, he now needs to raise money to defend his cultural freedom to practice Shamanism.

One night in 2012 Swedish Customs raided Jungle Svonni’s home, detaining him for 18 days and confiscating the tools he uses to heal people. He was falsely accused of possessing illegal substances in the form of laboratory produced mescaline (the active ingredient in the cactus San Pedro) which is illegal in Sweden. Jungle did not and has never possessed this substance. He did have powdered San Pedro which is NOT illegal in Sweden. San Pedro is one of the sacred plants used in the practice of Shamanism.

Jungle Svonni’s case has been taken to the Swedish Court of Appeals twice and both times a clear not guilty judgment has been made. Jungle Svonni has never been guilty of any crime. But the persecution continues. Swedish authorities are currently preparing a third case against Jungle Svonni.Jungle need to raise money for legal proceedings he still faces and to clear his name.

What We Need

  • We need $200 000 for legal proceedings and to pay expert witnesses.
  • We need to raise awareness of the role of shamanism in the Sami culture.
  • We need to campaign on behalf of shamanism for a law change in Sweden regarding medicinal plants.
  • If we do not reach our goal all the funding we do receive will go toward achieving our objectives.

The Impact

  • This project is vital in helping to create a consciousness and behavior that not only fulfills the well-being of individuals but also enables a sustainable and respectful relationship with the natural world.
  • Right now there are vital questions being asked about our lifestyles and our relationships to each other and the environment. This campaign is about answering those questions with some of the most trusted and ancient tools used by humanity
  • Jungle Svonni has spent most of his life enabling growth and evolution in individuals and communities. We all need to see the world from multiple points of view or we end up seeing everything one way. The evidence is that we are failing the planet and each other this way.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please go to our website http://supportjunglesvonni.jimdo.com/ to learn more and see what else you can do
  • Please share this Indiegogo page and our website through your networks.

story:
The Inside Scoop

Buck Off magazine is the combined effort of Salem State University alumni trying to bring literary awesomeness to the people.

The idea first came to Editor-in-Chief Sara when she was in DC for the annual Association of Writers and Writing Programs (AWP) conference. Tired of seeing literary magazines that published the same stuff over and over again, she wanted to showcase the dirty, raunchy fun side of writing.

Two years later on a snowy March day, she and her latest BFF Joe are sitting in another AWP panel and together they realize that it's now or never. The panel, about how video games, fan fiction and comic should be considered literary art too, made the pair say, "screw the lit snobs, let's do this."

Helping us out, not supports our dream, but it tells the naysayers that talent and creativity are valid no matter the form. And that's what Writing With Attitude is all about.


What We Need

Launch and securing a lit mag is surprisingly costly.

  • We need at least $1,000 to launch the magazine. Most of that, roughly $500, is to cover the cost of copyright and trademarking the magazine.
  • Another big chunk covers all computer related issues like domain name support.
  • The rest covers the gifts and shipping.

We've selected a wide variety of incentives, that we hope will interest most of you. The prices reflect what we've seen and experienced as literary citizens.


Other Ways You Can Help

Every dollars helps.

But we know the economy is crap and sometimes saving is better than spending. If you want to help, but can't afford to open your wallets, we ask that you send the link to a friend, co-worker, family member, arch nemesis, or post to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and that site you deny membership to but check it every hour.

story:
"We believe that you shouldn't have to pay more money for your homebuilt aircraft engine than you do for your entire airframe!"ng

Mick Myal
 Founding Editor of CONTACT! Magazine

To build your own aircraft your way, the way that meets your needs, the way that allows you to showcase your abilities, your creativity, your innovation and your craftsmanship- should not have to cost your life savings- and we're here to try to do something about that.

This is why for the past 20 years, in addition to publishing a top quality magazine aimed squarely at the homebuilding community, CONTACT! Magazine has produced a series of books on Alternative Engines used in homebuilt (experimental) aircraft- to help lead the way in showcasing alternative ideas and clever ways to save money by building, installing, and flying an alternative engine in homebuilt aircraft- without sacrificing quality or safety.

We're not satisfied with the status quo, and we're sure you aren't either.

From supercharged V-8 automobile engines to lawn mower engines and everything in between, we've reviewed them all in CONTACT! Magazine with many of those articles being compiled into our book series. To date, four engine-specific compilations have been published and the newest such book, Alternative Engines Volume 4, has just been hatched!  

In the photo above: The Black Book (Volume 1) contains the first five years' worth of alternative engine articles that appeared in the pages of CONTACT! Magazine. The Blue Book (Volume 2) covers the second five year period, the Gold Book (Volume 3) covers the third five year period, and the Red Book (Volume 4) is the newest compilation. 

To preview the new Volume 4, the Red Book, click here.
All four books are available for purchase through our website. 
And if you've never seen CONTACT! Magazine but would like to, click here.

Our Book Needs Color!
All of our engine books to date have been produced in black and white and they look great! However, we have a new opportunity to also produce a FULL COLOR version of Volume 4. We have the proof in hand and it looks stunning!!! We debuted it at the COPPERSTATE fly-in October 2013 and the response was overwhelming.

While black and white gets the information across, color just brings everything to life. We work hard to make the photography that appears in CONTACT! Magazine help to tell the story, and we're proud of that work, so it's really a shame to lose a portion of the quality by publishing our book in black and white.

The only thing keeping us from printing it in color is the cost. It's a big book, nearly 350 pages total, and that equates to a big cost to print. The cost of the printer's setup is what's killing us, so what we're after is the money it will take to create the plates and set up the equipment for our press run. 

But we can't do it without your help!

What We Need & What You Get
What we need is very simple: we need your support. We need you to help us bring this quality information to those who are waiting for it, and to do it in the full glory that it deserves. There's just no way we can pull this off without your help, but we're not asking for a handout! You will receive more than just a warm feeling if you chose to help us.

What do you get in return for your help? 

  • We're offering several rewards for those who step up. To us, the most important of those is to have your name added to a special page in the front of the book, a permanent record acknowledging your support. However, if you'd rather remain anonymous we can add a friend's name, your pet's name, your business name, or anyone else that you'd like to recognize in this way. 

    No matter which level you decide to help us through, your name will be included. For all of those who have already purchased the color version through our website or magazine (and have been patiently waiting for us to go to print) rest assured that your names will be added before the books are printed.
     

  • At the next level, we're offering a beautiful, 100% cotton, black ball cap. This is a special, limited edition that will only be available through this campaign. While we make similar hats available to our subscribers through a link on our website, this hat will be embroidered with gold thread, as opposed to the usual white stitching.

Ultimately, however, the best gift we have to offer our supporters is a limited collector's edition, hard-bound version of the book. 

We will only print enough of this edition to fulfill our obligation to those who help at this level. In any case, there will be a maximum of only 100 of these printed (probably far fewer that that), and each one will be signed and dated by the editor and numbered in the order in which the contributions are received. 


Being the first to contribute $200 or more toward our efforts will get you book #1, with the others in sequence.

Note: All contributions made before December 15th that are linked to rewards that do not require printing will be sent as soon as we receive notice of the contribution. This way we'd like to ensure that they will arrive before Christmas for the purpose of gift-giving. For those gifts that require printing or that we otherwise won't have in stock before Christmas, a gift certificate can be mailed to you, or the recirpiant of your gift if you choose, But you will have to tell is that it is a gift.  

We're Nonprofit
Since its inception CONTACT! Magazine has been operated as a legitimate 501(c)3 nonprofit corporation using 100% volunteer effort. All of your support will go directly to the production of the educational book we're offering, and the actual contribution portion of your support (the net amount we receive after deducting the production cost of your gift) is tax deductible in most cases. Please discuss this with your tax consultant. After the dust settles, and before the end of 2013, you'll receive a receipt and our thanks for the deductible portion of your contribution.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute- but that doesn't mean they can’t help:

PLEASE help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
 

Send a link to this page to all your friends, asking them to do likewise, but also ask them to consider helping us make this book become available. 
 

And while maybe the $200 "Limited Collector's Edition" hard-bound version isn't for you, perhaps you know someone who would appreciate it as a gift! Or you might want to send a link to this page to a loved one as a hint for what YOU would like as a gift.

 

Please consider claiming more than one reward. While we couldn't bundle everything in every combination, you can always give more than once to get the rewards you would like to receive. 

Thank you SO VERY MUCH for your support!!!

We will only print enough of this edition to fulfill our obligation to those who help at this level. In any case, there will be a maximum of only 100 of these printed (probably far fewer that that), and each one will be signed and dated by the editor and numbered in the order in which the contributions are received. 






Being the first to contribute $200 or more toward our efforts will get you book #1, with the others in sequence.Note: All contributions made before December 15th that are linked to rewards that do not require printing will be sent as soon as we receive notice of the contribution. This way we'd like to ensure that they will arrive before Christmas for the purpose of gift-giving. For those gifts that require printing or that we otherwise won't have in stock before Christmas, a gift certificate can be mailed to you, or the recirpiant of your gift if you choose, But you will have to tell is that it is a gift.  We're NonprofitSince its inception CONTACT! Magazine has been operated as a legitimate 501(c)3 nonprofit corporation using 100% volunteer effort. All of your support will go directly 
to the production of the educational book we're offering, and the actual 
contribution portion of your support (the net amount we receive after deducting the production cost of your gift) is tax deductible in most cases. Please discuss this with your tax consultant. After the dust settles, and before the end of 2013, you'll receive a receipt and our thanks for the deductible portion of your contribution.
Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can’t 
contribute- but that doesn't mean they can’t help:

PLEASE 
help us get the word out and make some noise 
about our campaign!
 

Send a link to this page to all your friends, 
asking them to do likewise, but also ask them to consider helping us make this 
book become available. 
 

And while maybe the $200 "Limited Collector's 
Edition" hard-bound version isn't for you, perhaps you know someone who would 
appreciate it as a gift! Or you might want to send a link to this page 
to a loved one as a hint for what YOU would like as a gift.
 

Please consider claiming more than one 
reward. While we couldn't bundle everything in every combination, you can always 
give more than once to get the rewards you would like to receive. 


Thank you SO VERY MUCH for your support!!!

story:
The Worlds Largest Christmas Stocking: Phase 2

A HUGE thank you to all of those that have supported our campaign to build the Worlds Largest Christmas Stocking! We are determined to make a difference in the lives of our children in the community. We still need your help!  Please consider donating to our cause and be a part of History! 

Who are we?

The Friends of Wake County Guardian ad Litem ("Friends") is a volunteer 501c3, non-profit organization that was established in 1991. Their mission statement is "To enhance the lives of at risk children and their caregivers through programs which promote their physical, educational, and emotional well-being."  The population they support are children in foster care, out of home kinship placements and families that are working hard to break the poverty cycle. 

Our Campaign…

We are raising funds to produce a family event this December where children and their families or caregivers can experience the magic of the holidays. With the help and support of the community we will be attempting to construct the"Worlds Largest Christmas Stocking" and break a Guinness Worlds Record! Our stocking will be 180 feet long and 110 feet wide! We will be inviting the community out to help us fill this stocking with gifts for abused and neglected children in Wake County, many of which have never had a Christmas present before. In an effort to do something this big, we need your help! 

There are so many more kids out there who need our help and part of this endeavor is to bring much needed awareness to our organization and the work we do throughout the year. "The Friends" also sponsors a Back to School Pride, by providing back packs and school supplies for school aged children. Project Graduation provides support for youth that are in out of home placements that graduate from schools or training programs. In addition to these programs, we also have a "Special Request Fund", which is a fund for deserving children who need financial support for basic needs most children take for granted. Some of these requests include; class trip money, sport registration fees, uniforms, camps, tutoring, recycled computers or any other special needs identified by their social worker. 

All of the programs that we have in place are implemented through volunteers and funded through grants and community donors. Due to the lack of funds,  we have to turn many requests away. Our hope is that by holding this wonderful community event, we will not only be able to provide these children with a magical holiday by filling that stocking with gifts, but also by funding the projects we have in place throught out the year. It is our desire to never have to turn away a child in need. 

What are we asking of you?

In order to construct the Worlds Largest Christmas Stocking, and hold our family, holiday event, we need to raise $150,000. If we can get this project off the ground, we plan to make this an annual event and fill our stocking with toys and gifts for abused and neglected children year after year! We are asking for any donation you feel comfortable making, and for your help in spreading the word to friends, family and co-workers. 

Where is my money going?

All of the money donated to this campaign will go directly to the Friends of Wake Guardian ad Litem program, which is a non-profit 501c3 organization. The money for this campaign will fund our Inaugural Christmas County Fair Project which will consist of a gift drive to fill the Worlds Largest Christmas Stocking, with all gifts to be donated to abused and neglected children, children in the Foster care system, and children that are 200% below the poverty line.  In addition to the gifts, our family, holiday event  will provide much needed awareness and additional funding through ticket sales to support our other service projects throughout the year so that we will never have to turn down another request from a child in need. 

What happens if we don't reach our Goal?

100% of the money we raise from the Indiegogo campaign will go directly to the Friends of Wake Guardian ad Litem program to help fund all of their service projects throughout the year, which include; Back to School Pride, Project Graduation, Guardian Angel Holiday Tree project, Computers for kids, and our Special Request Fund.

story:
"In the beginning, Father God, His son Jesus, and Holy Spirit had a wonderful idea."

Fingers and Toes is the name of my new Children's book. I have launched this campaign to fund the production and printing of this super special Sprit-led story. 

STORY TIME! 

One day, I was driving to work at 3AM (yes, you read that right) when I had a crazy idea. So crazy, it had to have been the Holy Spirit. :) I was reminded of Paul's analogy of the body of Christ in 1 Corinthians 12. I imagined arguing eyes and ears in my minds eye. How does God respond? I knew it had to become a book. This simple idea had the potential to revolutionize the way the church sees itself, starting with our children.  

From the moment we were created, God planned how His people, the Body of Christ, would work together. The Trinity thought up what would please Him, and created you and I as an expression of His delight. Fingers and Toes is a kid-friendly adaptation of Paul's metaphor of the body of Christ in which eyes and ears come alive to illustrate how God lovingly parents his children so that, together, they can be everything they were created to be. I need your help to make Fingers and Toes a reality, so adults and children alike can discover God’s intention toward His church as a child, a temple, and a bride.

Here is some concept art created by my talented friend, Taylor Miller. This picture shows Jesus creating a part of the body. 

Whats in it for you? 

I have one word for you: Prizes. 
Everybody loves prizes! In this case, you, my friend, can receive anything from a thank you letter to a song written just for you. The prize you get is dependent upon the amount of money you donate. In this case, the prizes can act as a type of pre-ordering system in which you can also receive one of the very first copies of Fingers and Toes.

No Risk, All Reward

This means that if I don't raise all of the money I need, you get your money back. There is absolutely no risk to you when you donate:) Unfortunately, if I don't raise all of the money I need, I will not be able to print Fingers and Toes. 

Why do I need support? 

My goal is to raise a total of $3,000. Here is where it will go: 
  • Production. Your generous contributions will go toward the cost of getting the book in top shape for printing and marketing. My project manager from Tate and I will begin editing the manuscript. Later, we will design the layout and do all sorts of other productiony things. Production usually lasts around 180 days.  

  • Illustrations. Illustrations will add an extra month to the editing portion of production. The art that you have seen so far is only concept art.  However, as I receive illustrations, I would love to provide a sneak-preview for my backers who follow on the official website or Facebook page. 
  • Printing. My goal is to have a book in your hands by late spring/early summer of 2015. The bulk of donations will go toward printing Fingers and Toes. 
  • Marketing. A marketing representative from Tate that will help me advertise and get the book on some shelves. 

Impact

    Fingers and Toes is an essential tool for friends and family members to instruct "the greatest among you" about unity in the church.  This book will enable children to understand that, as a part of the body, it is their job to work together in order to fulfill the dream of God. Together, we can raise up a generation of children who doesn't see denominational lines, but value each member of the body for its unique ideas and gifts. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      MAKE SOME NOISE! Help me spread the word to people only YOU can reach. Help me get this book into the hands of your church, family, and friends and people all over America who are part of the Body of Christ!

story:
(UPDATE: My thank you cards have arrived and I'll be sending them out in the next week. You'll start receiving your gifts soon!)

(Please) Help Me To Launch This Book

An Important Book for Nurses on How to Bring More Awareness and Compassion to the Bedside

Help Make the Nurse at Your Bedside Happier

Despite its enormous positive impact on the lives of millions of people, nursing can be a thankless job.

Nurse burnout is almost an epidemic due to stress, inadequate staffing, low pay, and lack of recognition.

So where should nurses turn? How can they take better care of themselves and show up at the bedside to care for those who need them?

The answers to these questions and more are in my book: Minding the Bedside: Nursing from the Heart of the Awakened Mind. My name is Jerome Stone. I’ve been a Registered Nurse for over 30 years. I’m a successful blogger, published author, and meditation instructor. Most important, I’m committed to transforming the way nurses show up at the bedside by teaching them how to be compassionate toward themselves and others.

My book helps nurses learn to open their hearts and minds to care for those who need them.

About the Book:

The first run of Minding the Bedside: Nursing from the Heart of the Awakened Mind was released in September 2011. The book is for nurses and healthcare practitioners and is a thorough guide to meditation and compassion practices. The practices and techniques covered in this book can help to antidote and alleviate the stress that nurses and healthcare practitioners experience working at the bedside.

The book has received positive reviews in peer-reviewed journals, online publications, and websites.

Since publishing the book, I’ve been creating tons of free content on the book’s blog-site, offering wit and wisdom to the thousands of readers who appreciate what I have to offer. I’ve even published two FREE ebooks on the site that continue to be downloaded and enjoyed by visitors to the site. In the recent months, visits to my site have increased and there’s a lot of interest in what I have to offer, but I’m not a publicist, and I need money to fulfill my vision.

What’s Been Done So Far:

As a self-published author I’ve done it all. I’ve:

  • Presented public talks
  • Been interviewed on internet radio
  • Taught healthcare providers (YouTube Video, my presentation starts at 3:31)
  • Written over 120 blog-posts related to meditation and compassion
  • Guest-blogged on a variety of sites
  • Sent out hundreds of free copies of my book to professionals as well as lay-people to review and refer
  • And have been responsible for marketing and promoting my book

This book is an extension of the guiding principle of my life, serving others. In my work-life, I've shared my skills and expertise, as well as my compassion, with my patients. In my writing and on my blog, I've done the best that I can to share what I've learned in my meditation practice with my readers. As a contributor, you’ll be helping me to be of service, sharing what I’ve learned through the application of meditative awareness and compassion at the bedside. You’ll also be directly involved in helping others by giving them tools to help them work with their emotional suffering and turmoil. Additionally, you’re paying it forward by helping those who help others.

What Needs to Be Done Now:

It’s been a great year but now it’s time for a cash-transfusion to boost my exposure, visibility, online presence and…sales! The thing is, I’ve spent ALL of my savings just getting this far. There are over 3.1 million nurses in the US and over 20 million nurses worldwide. There's a market for this book, and in the nursing profession there’s an incredible need for the methods and practices outline in this book.

This is where you come in. Help me with the infrastructure and support to get my book into the hands of as many nurses and healthcare professionals as possible. I need the support of the Indiegogo community to help move to the next stage to promote this book. I need you!

The Financial Scoop and Needs Breakdown:

I don’t want my book to sit on a shelf with the other 5-trillion books in print. I want to it to have an impact and benefit people. So, here’s what I need to do it right.

These amounts are based on what I’ve spent previously on my book (as well as what I haven’t been able to spend!) and are based on what printers, distributors, publicists, editors, and other successful authors have shared with me on what to expect my expenses to be.

ITEM COST
Advertising; magazine, targeted audience. Four (4) ads @ ~ $1200/ad $ 4,800
Book tour expenses for re-launch, 3 months @ $2400/month $ 7,200
Worldwide Book Distribution Services $ 3,700
eBook formatting and distribution across all platforms $ 900
Postage for Advance Reader distribution $ 200
Printing – $2.75/copy of 180 page book x 1000 first edition $ 2,750
Publicist , Promotion and Marketing $ 5,000
Website development and maintenance, includes development, optimization and monthly fees x 12 months $ 2,500
SUBTOTAL $ 27,050
   
Miscellaneous (approx. 10% of total costs) $ 2,705
   
TOTAL $ 29,755

Big Publishing Houses Have the Cash, Self-Published Authors (Usually) Don't:

You can see that the total amount that I need far exceeds what I’m asking for. Why? Because this list itemizes what I’ll need in an “ideal” list. And a full-on, no-holds-barred campaign would probably be double that. That's what traditional big publishing houses can spend on the promotion of a book. However, I chose not to go with a big publishing house because I didn't want someone else deciding when and how I could give my content away. And I understand that the ideal may not be what I will get in reality. So, I’m going for $15,000 as a ballpark figure of the minimum that I need to do a successful launch. If I get more than that amount, that’s awesome!

And…what if I don’t get the full amount? I’m going to do it anyway, but I’ll have to take smaller steps. I’m bound and determined to get this material out and to make an impact on how nurses can deal with work-related stress in a positive way. I’ll scrimp where I have to, but I’d rather not, and work hand-to-mouth, which I’m already doing, but it would sure be easier to do this without having to sweat the details. If I have to, I’ll launch a second campaign after I get as far as I can with what I’ve received from this one.

The Impact of it All:

I love to serve others in whatever way I can. I need to be of service to feel like I’m making a difference in this crazy and often mixed up world. And using what I’ve learned in life and sharing it with others, especially if I can help to prevent and/or alleviate pain and suffering, is what it’s all about!

My track-record speaks for itself. I’ve been a successful professional for over 30 years. Having made a mid-life career change, I’ve successfully self-published a book, have learned the art of blogging and entrepreneurship, and have learned to help others through the written word.

What you’ll be doing by contributing to this campaign could end up benefitting countless others. What you’ll get, tangibly, are the perks listed to the right of this column. The intangible is even more important; somewhere, a nurse will read this book and, because of you, will show up at the bedside more present and more compassionate, able to do his or her work, with an aware mind and an open heart.

Somewhere, maybe even in your hometown, patients will get better care because their nurse has had an opportunity to learn from this book and from the services and content provided on this book’s blog. Someone…maybe even you, will have a happier nurse at the bedside. Think about it. Pay it forward.

Other Ways You Can Help -

So you say, how can I help even if I can’t contribute a dime? Glad that you asked. If you like this idea and what you’ve seen here but really can’t spare the change, please consider the following:

  • Visit the site, www.mindingthebedside.com. The site has awesome resources FOR YOU on how to meditate and work with the challenges to your well-being.
  • Tweet, facebook, like and otherwise social-network support of this project.
  • If you have a friend, relative or acquaintance who’s an RN or healthcare professional, tell them about this campaign. Also, tell them about my site and my book.
  • Tell your friends about this project and encourage them to support it.
  • Tell you wealthy family members, aunts, uncles, acquaintances, and…total strangers about this project.
  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

So that’s my pitch. I hope that what I’ve written has conveyed my heartfelt intentions to make this book a success and to really benefit others. I hope that it’s spoken to you, in some manner, so that you’ll consider making a difference through your contribution(s). Most of all, I hope that all that you do in life is met with success and that through your efforts, you are able to make a difference in the world, to benefit others in your endeavors, and to live compassionately.

Thank you,

I’m bound and determined to get this material out and to make an impact on how nurses can deal with work-related stress in a positive way. I’ll scrimp where I have to, but I’d rather not, and work hand-to-mouth, which I’m already doing, but it would sure be easier to do this without having to sweat the details. If I have to, I’ll launch a second campaign after I get as far as I can with what I’ve received from this one.
The Impact of it All:
I love to serve others in whatever way I can. I need to be of service to feel like I’m making a difference in this crazy and often mixed up world. And using what I’ve learned in life and sharing it with others, especially if I can help to prevent and/or alleviate pain and suffering, is what it’s all about!
My track-record speaks for itself. I’ve been a successful professional for over 30 years. Having made a mid-life career change, I’ve successfully self-published a book, have learned the art of blogging and entrepreneurship, and have learned to help others through the written word.
What you’ll be doing by contributing to this campaign could end up benefitting countless others. What you’ll get, tangibly, are the perks listed to the right of this column. The intangible is even more important; somewhere, a nurse will read this book and, because of you, will show up at the bedside more present and more compassionate, able to do his or her work, with an aware mind and an open heart.
Somewhere, maybe even in your hometown, patients will get better care because their nurse has had an opportunity to learn from this book and from the services and content provided on this book’s blog. Someone…maybe even you, will have a happier nurse at the bedside. Think about it. Pay it forward.
Other Ways You Can Help -
So you say, how can I help even if I can’t contribute a dime? Glad that you asked. If you like this idea and what you’ve seen here but really can’t spare the change, please consider the following:

Visit the site, www.mindingthebedside.com. The site has awesome resources FOR YOU on how to meditate and work with the challenges to your well-being.
Tweet, facebook, like and otherwise social-network support of this project.
If you have a friend, relative or acquaintance who’s an RN or healthcare professional, tell them about this campaign. Also, tell them about my site and my book.
Tell your friends about this project and encourage them to support it.
Tell you wealthy family members, aunts, uncles, acquaintances, and…total strangers about this project.
Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!
So that’s my pitch. I hope that what I’ve written has conveyed my heartfelt intentions to make this book a success and to really benefit others. I hope that it’s spoken to you, in some manner, so that you’ll consider making a difference through your contribution(s). Most of all, I hope that all that you do in life is met with success and that through your efforts, you are able to make a difference in the world, to benefit others in your endeavors, and to live compassionately.
Thank you,

story:
Allergic To Time is a sci fi thriller set in Australia. It's about time travel. BUT WAIT! There's more...

What if time travel was possible, only people were allergic to it? That is the concept of Crystal Gallagher's "Allergic To Time", a sci fi mystery-thriller-humour novel featuring a team of "Undercover Time Travel Detectives" whose purpose it is to solve the mystery of time travel. When a mysterious visitor - claiming to be from the past, and unable to breathe the atmosphere - turns up in modern day Sydney, the team uncover more than they bargained for when they investigate the case.

It's Douglas Adams meets Hemmingway! Asimov meets Dr Who! "The Bell Jar" meets "21 Jump St". And more. 

Allergic To Time  needs funding to make it possible! There are several reasons for this:

- Crystal "Voice of her generation" Gallagher needs cash to write and to fulfill her dream of never waitressing again!
- The funds will go towards editing and final cover design
- Allergic To Time will be extended to a series (starting with Book Two: Addicted To Time) after publication of the first book.

The book is 2/3rds of the way to completion: it just needs a tiny cash injection and a bit of encouragement to reach the finish line.

You can check out my website crystalgallagherisamazing.com if you like.

Crystal

story:
If you could change the way you see the world, make it a gentler, kinder, brighter place—not just for you but for others too—would you do it?  Here’s how!

I’m Valentine McKay-Riddell.  I write fiction, fantasy and magic realism.

I’ve just signed a contract with Sunstone Press here in Santa Fe, New Mexico, to publish The River Goddess & Other Stories and Starfriends,  Books I and II of The Alyssa Chronicles fantasy series for young adults, which follows a young girl’s adventures in alternate reality with animals, aliens, and other fascinating beings. My contribution to the cost of publication is $2650-- however in order to cover additional costs, such as perks for donors, book purchases, and travel for book signings, I need to raise $3400.

Why Do These Books Matter?

First of all, they're a great read!  The Alyssa Chronicles introduces not just young adults but readers of all ages to compassionate earth stewardship, the basic concepts of shamanism, and the marvelous possibilities that arise when you believe in yourself and are willing to step bravely into the unknown.

And that's not all!  A percentage of all book sales goes to Orenda Healing International, based in Santa Fe since 1993.  Our mission supports individual and community health and wellbeing.  Our current focus is the Stone Soup Project for Returning Veterans, which you can read about on my blog,

River Goddess Updates http://rivergoddessupdates.wordpress.com/. 

And you can learn more about us at

Orenda Healing International  http://www.orenda-arts.org.

There's even more to come!  Alyssa and her friends have pushed me to begin work on a third book in the series-- a novel crammed with romance, intrigue, Indian magic, and time travel!

What's the Story?

Alyssa, the heroine of Book I, The River Goddess & Other Stories, is a young girl who comes into her power with the aid of a mysterious River Goddess, a number of helpful animals and other beings, and a very old friend.  Alyssa faces many dangers and overcomes numerous challenges along the way.  As she learns how to tap into the magic of everyday life, she gradually develops a deep respect for her non-human guides and for herself.  In Starfriends, her adventures lead her further into the unknown-- and deeper into the discovery of her own wisdom and strength.  this is the "Hero's Journey" from a feminine point of view-- a journey upon which we are all embarked, male and female alike, as we rediscover our true role:  that of fellow travelers with all the beings who share space on the small blue planet we call Earth.

A Little Background:

This series was inspired by my own Celtic and Native American heritage, my training and experience as a shamanic counselor and psychologist, and my empathy for young people.  The Alyssa Chronicles is a tribute to the magic in everyday life—mine and yours. 

What Readers Are Saying:

"I laughed, cried, and laughed again!  The River Goddess & Other Stories, though written essentially for young girls, touches the inner child in grown women as well.  Alyssa reminds me of my own younger self."  Carol Calvert, Order of Ovates, Bards, and Druids, London, England; Ordained Priest, Independent Catholic Apostolic Church of Antioch, Santa Fe, NM.

"Valentine has written a marvelous book, The River Goddess & Other Stories.  I highly recommend it.  In a sense it's for teen and pre-teens but it works for anyone.  It's really a fairy tale or fable in the deepest sense of the word:  A teaching story about magical, shamanic, earth-centered practice and connection to nature." Joan Forest Mage, Executive Director, Life Force Arts Center, Chicago, IL.

"With a very limited number of heroines in contemporary books that young girls can identify with, The River Goddess & Other Stories is a beautiful addition.  In fact, it is so well writtten and imagined that boys of all ages (including my own) would enjoy it as well.  The inclusion of Alyssa's family along with animal spirit guides in these culturally fascinating adventures is also a strong bonus.  In the last story, one of those very verbal animal friends notes that it is unusual to find humans who believe in, not magic exactly, but 'possibilities.'  The best of stories open up new worlds of possibilities.  In this the author succeeds, not just by creating this new world of possibilities, but also by discovering the possibilities of the world we inhabit and may not have fully noticed yet.  This is a book well worth reading and then sharing."  Robert F. Morgan, PhD, chair, Department of Psychology, University of Arkansas, Little Rock.

"The River Goddess is a collection of stories about a young girl who has a special ability in her innocence to communicate with nature. The magic that ensues is not flash/bang, but natural in a shamanistic tradition. There are profound lessons of humans manintaining a balance with nature in these stories. I recommend it especially for young girls who have given up their belief in Santa Claus, but miss the wonderful magic. It will stimulate their interest in biology and ecology as well. And adults can only be charmed by her adventures."  Julie Keitges, Berkeley, CA.

In order not to disappoint the readers who've loved The River Goddess & Other Stories and are impatiently waiting for Starfriends, and to introduce new readers to Alyssa and her fascinating friends, I need to raise $3400 as soon as possible!

You can help!

Remember, a percentage of all book sales will support our returning veterans through the Stone Soup Project. 

Indiegogo has two ways in which you can donate:  PayPal or credit card. 

I want to thank you for your support by offering you these gifts in return:

Friend:                $10 - $24   

Credit in a special section of the new editions plus a sneak peek via pdf of a chapter from The River Goddess & Other Stories.

Ally:                     $25 - $49   

Same as Friend plus a beautiful white sage smudge stick and signed copy of The River Goddess & Other Stories as soon as it is published.

Druid:                  $50 - $99   

Same as Friend and Ally plus a signed copy of Starfriends as soon as it is published.

Goddess/God:  $100 +

Same as Friend, Ally, and Druid, plus a sneak peek via pdf of a chapter from Starfriends and a beautiful River Goddess T-shirt with original art from The River Goddess & Other Stories (while supplies last)!!!

All donors will be honored in my blog, River Goddess Updates, http://rivergoddessupdates.wordpress.com/ and all will be credited in a special section of the new editions.

Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if you can't donate right now, you can still help!

Get the word out!  Let your friends and family, clients, and colleagues know about the River Goddess campaign.  (Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools-- they work!)  And when they are back in print, buy the books!

The River Goddess will change how you see the world-- in every good way you can imagine!

story:
***Update***

How would you like to win 6 limited hardcover books in the Empire of Blood series, no donation or purchase necessary? 

Just make sure you're signed into your Indiegogo account (or register for one if need be, it's completely free!) and then share the link on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, or via the Indiegogo share tools on the campaign page where you can even share via email or embed it on your blog! Basically share the hell out of it, because Indiegogo tracks each of those as referrals and the person with the most referrals at the end of this campaign will win signed limited hardcover copies of each of the following as soon as they're available: SHINING IN CRIMSON: EMPIRE OF BLOOD BOOK ONE (available in October), FADING IN DARKNESS: EMPIRE OF BLOOD BOOK TWO (already available), RISING FROM ASHES: EMPIRE OF BLOOD BOOK THREE (slated for January to March release), ORIGINS OF BLOOD: THE RISE OF CAESAR (summer 2014), ORIGINS OF BLOOD: ISHAN THE ANCIENT (autumn 2014), and ORIGINS OF BLOOD: QUEEN OF THE DEAD (winter 2014).

And for those of you who have already contributed, you can also compete to win. If you happen to win and you've already chosen one of the prizes as your contribution perk, you will receive a special replacement gift.


Robert S. Wilson and Empire of Blood:

"Robert S. Wilson proves himself a master of the dark fantastic."--Tim Waggoner, author of LIKE DEATH and THE HARMONY SOCIETY

 

"A writer on the rise, Robert S. Wilson's fiction is highly original, deftly written, and shows a refreshing commitment to (and respect for) craft and depth."--Greg F. Gifune, author, THE BLEEDING SEASON

 

"Wilson is a dark force to be reckoned with."--Trent Zelazny, author of DESTINATION UNKNOWN and FRACTAL DESPONDENCY

 

Download the first book SHINING IN CRIMSON for free here!

Praise for Shining in Crimson: Empire of Blood Book One


"A big-scale vampire thriller that changes the rules."--Scott Nicholson, bestselling Kindle author of After, Liquid Fear, and They Hunger 


"One of the best surprises I've had in a long while. Writing with a smart, self-assured ease, Robert S. Wilson has given us a gift with Shining in Crimson. Part Underworld, part Escape From New York, Shining in Crimson is genuinely frightening, genuinely thrilling, but above all, first-rate storytelling. I'm a Robert S. Wilson fan from now on!"--Joe McKinney, Bram Stoker Award-winning author of Flesh Eaters and Apocalypse of the Dead

 


"Robert S. Wilson shows a lot of promise here with this debut novel. Now it's time to see where that promise will take him."--Ray Wallace, The Chiaroscuro

"You'll not find some glistening torsos and smouldering eyes in this book. What you will find is a brilliantly thought out society of Vampires."--Jim Mcleod, Ginger Nuts of Horror

"The Mesh of Religious symbolism and political commentary tucked neatly between pure horror and suspense is superb."--Lisa Lane, The Cerebral Writer

"With well-fleshed characters, multiple storylines and a vampire history that makes sense, Shining in Crimson: (Empire of Blood #1) is a well-written horror novel. I am anticipating the second and third books in the series."--Trembles Horror Magazine

 

Introducing RISING FROM ASHES: EMPIRE OF BLOOD BOOK THREE! Click here to read the description for book three on its Goodreads page. (***Warning: This description has spoiliers for those who have yet to finish Fading in Darkness***)

 

Hi, I'm Robert S. Wilson, author of the Empire of Blood series (SHINING IN CRIMSON, FADING IN DARKNESS and the forthcoming RISING FROM ASHES). I'm a Bram Stoker Award-nominated editor and author of dark speculative fiction ranging from science fiction and dark fantasy to noir and horror.

When I first started to get feedback from readers about SHINING IN CRIMSON, the most common response I got went something like this, "Where is book two? When will it be out? What kind of monster ARE YOU? HOW CAN YOU DO THIS TO ME?" Well, not so much those last two although I did have a couple of (albeit understandable) nasty and negative complaints after a while. And at the time I started writing FID, I had every intention of releasing the book within the next year. And then life went and changed on me. See, back then I was only a writer. But then I got into editing. I started with co-editing the AIDS charity book, Horror for Good: A Charitable Anthology. And then from there my life, and attention, became split in two directions. Writing and editing.

Shortly after that, along with two partners, I launched Nightscape Press and became its Editor in Chief. And ever since I've been very, very busy. But these things alone do not pay the bills yet, sadly, and I long ago took up freelance editing and various other author services in order to get by. Between both Nightscape Press and freelance work, I end up with very little time for writing. And because of which, it took nearly two years to finish FADING IN DARKNESS. And that was completely due to the fact that I had too many commitments to handle at the same time. 

So, I know as more people read FADING IN DARKNESS, they are going to want to read the next book and I'd like to make that happen much faster this time. I have two chapters written, but I find myself constantly dragged away from my progress by other commitments. So my plan with this fundraiser at its core, is to help fund the process of finishing the book in three short months. Two months to write it and one for a professional editor to help me make it shine. This time period would start as soon as the fundraiser is over. So, if all works out, the book will be ready to release as early as the beginning of January, 2014!

This money will also cover the cost of editing, cover art, promotion, paying for the perks I'm offering to contributors, my coke habit (just kidding!), etc. This book is in my head and so very ready to come out into the world. And regardless of this campaign the book will see the light of day. But I don't think I'm the only one who doesn't want to wait another two friggin' years for that to happen!

 

The Perks!

I think I've put together some great perks for long time fans as well as people who have yet to read even the first Empire of Blood book:

  • Ebook editions of RISING FROM ASHES and/or SHINING IN CRIMSON (book one) and FADING IN DARKNESS (book two) for a low price!

  • Signed paperback and limited hardcover editions of each individual book in the series as well as the same in omnibus editions.

  • Interactive perks: Name a vampire or a Foederati soldier in RISING FROM ASHES. Use your own name or somebody elses, or make one up. Your call!

  • Rare pieces of memorabilia: Signed and personalized manuscripts of SHINING IN CRIMSON, an early draft of my unpublished novella THE NESTING PLACE, and more.

  • All contributors of any amount will be listed in the book's acknowledgements page (unless, of course, you're embarrassed to be seen with me!). All contributors who choose a physical perk will receive a signed Empire of Blood bookmark as well.

 

The Impact?

Contributors to this campaign can sleep with ease at night knowing they've helped solve global problems like world hunger, war, and climate change (okay, maybe actually none of that really...):

While this fundraiser is going I will be finishing up my current freelance obligations and getting what little writing I can done. If funded I will balance a very strict writing schedule with my work at Nightscape Press and finish an editor-ready draft of RISING FROM ASHES within two months of the end of this fundraiser in order to have the book edited, formatted, and ready in at least ebook format for contributors by early January. Then the process of paperback and hardcover production, ordering, signing and personalizing will take place with the goal of having all copies shipped out by the end of March at the very latest. As far as the public release goes, I have yet to decide how I will handle that. As I said earlier, a portion of these funds will go to promotion and I would like to have at least a month after the book is ready to promote it before releasing it publicly. 

Here's my prior track record as an author, editor, and publisher:

Over the past several years as a writer I have written two novels (Empire of Blood books one and two), two novellas (THE QUIET and EXIT REALITY) and over a dozen short stories for various markets and as Kindle downloads.

As an editor I have co-edited two anthologies (the Bram Stoker Award-nominated HORROR FOR GOOD: A CHARITABLE ANTHOLOGY which contributes to amfAR, the Foundation for AIDS Research and is available now, and NIGHTSCAPES VOLUME 1 which will be available soon) and solely edited one anthology (BLOOD TYPE: AN ANTHOLOGY OF VAMPIRE SF ON THE CUTTING EDGE which will contribute to The Cystic Fibrosis Trust and is due to be released on October 30th this year).

And as a publisher I have edited and released five novels (A REQUIEM FOR DEAD FLIES by Peter N. Dudar, the Bram Stoker Award-winning LIFE RAGE by L.L. Soares, DUNGEON BRAIN by Bram Stoker Award-winning author Benjamin Kane Ethridge, THE EVOLUTIONIST by Rena Mason, and STEALING NIGHT by Peter Giglio), three novellas (BUTTERFLY POTION by Nightmare Award-winning author Trent Zelazny, SUNFALL MANOR by Peter Giglio, and THE ANGEL OF SHADWELL by Jonathan Templar, and proofread and published one anthology (WORLD'S COLLIDER: A SHARED-WORLD ANTHOLOGY edited by Richard Salter). 

For those who might be interested, here is a breakdown of how the funds donated to this campain will be used:

  • $1,000 more or less will go to my Promotion and Production fund to cover the cost of hiring a professional editor, cover artwork, some other minor production costs, and to promote the book.
  • $2,000 more or less will go to paying for the production and shipping of the physical perks offered in this campaign as well as counting the cut that Indiegogo will take out. If this ends up costing more than 2k, the extra will come from my Promotion and Production fund, if it ends up costing less, more will go toward promotion.
  • $2,000 will go toward two months of living expenses to cover my bills and any possible materials I need during the two month stretch of finishing the final draft of the book.

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who cannot contribute but would like to help out:

  • You can tell your friends by word of mouth, sharing on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Goodreads, Livejournal, your blog, smoke writing, morse code, yelling through a bullhorn in a moving car, or live song and dance performances! 
  • Don't forget to make great use of the Indiegogo share tools!

  • You could probably pray for my immortal soul... no never mind, too late...

Wilson fan from now on!"--Joe McKinney, Bram Stoker Award-winning author of Flesh Eaters and Apocalypse of the Dead
 
"Robert S. Wilson shows a lot of promise here with this debut novel. Now it's time to see where that promise will take him."--Ray Wallace, The Chiaroscuro"You'll not find some glistening torsos and smouldering eyes in this book. What you will find is a brilliantly thought out society of Vampires."--Jim Mcleod, Ginger Nuts of Horror"The Mesh of Religious symbolism and political commentary tucked neatly between pure horror and suspense is superb."--Lisa Lane, The Cerebral Writer"With well-fleshed characters, multiple storylines and a vampire history that makes sense, Shining in Crimson: (Empire of Blood #1) is a well-written horror novel. I am anticipating the second and third books in the series."--Trembles Horror Magazine

 
Introducing RISING FROM ASHES: EMPIRE OF BLOOD BOOK THREE! Click here to read the description for book three on its Goodreads page. (***Warning: This description has spoiliers for those who have yet to finish Fading in Darkness***)
 
Hi, I'm Robert S. Wilson, author of the Empire of Blood series (SHINING IN CRIMSON, FADING IN DARKNESS and the forthcoming RISING FROM ASHES). I'm a Bram Stoker Award-nominated editor and author of dark speculative fiction ranging from science fiction and dark fantasy to noir and horror.
When I first started to get feedback from readers about SHINING IN CRIMSON, the most common response I got went something like this, "Where is book two? When will it be out? What kind of monster ARE YOU? HOW CAN YOU DO THIS TO ME?" Well, not so much those last two although I did have a couple of (albeit understandable) nasty and negative complaints after a while. And at the time I started writing FID, I had every intention of releasing the book within the next year. And then life went and changed on me. See, back then I was only a writer. But then I got into editing. I started with co-editing the AIDS charity book, Horror for Good: A Charitable Anthology. And then from there my life, and attention, became split in two directions. Writing and editing.
Shortly after that, along with two partners, I launched Nightscape Press and became its Editor in Chief. And ever since I've been very, very busy. But these things alone do not pay the bills yet, sadly, and I long ago took up freelance editing and various other author services in order to get by. Between both Nightscape Press and freelance work, I end up with very little time for writing. And because of which, it took nearly two years to finish FADING IN DARKNESS. And that was completely due to the fact that I had too many commitments to handle at the same time. 
So, I know as more people read FADING IN DARKNESS, they are going to want to read the next book and I'd like to make that happen much faster this time. I have two chapters written, but I find myself constantly dragged away from my progress by other commitments. So my plan with this fundraiser at its core, is to help fund the process of finishing the book in three short months. Two months to write it and one for a professional editor to help me make it shine. This time period would start as soon as the fundraiser is over. So, if all works out, the book will be ready to release as early as the beginning of January, 2014!
This money will also cover the cost of editing, cover art, promotion, paying for the perks I'm offering to contributors, my coke habit (just kidding!), etc. This book is in my head and so very ready to come out into the world. And regardless of this campaign the book will see the light of day. But I don't think I'm the only one who doesn't want to wait another two friggin' years for that to happen!
 



The Perks!
I think I've put together some great perks for long time fans as well as people who have yet to read even the first Empire of Blood book:


Ebook editions of RISING FROM ASHES and/or SHINING IN CRIMSON (book one) and FADING IN DARKNESS (book two) for a low price!


Signed paperback and limited hardcover editions of each individual book in the series as well as the same in omnibus editions.


Interactive perks: Name a vampire or a Foederati soldier in RISING FROM ASHES. Use your own name or somebody elses, or make one up. Your call!


Rare pieces of memorabilia: Signed and personalized manuscripts of SHINING IN CRIMSON, an early draft of my unpublished novella THE NESTING PLACE, and more.

All contributors of any amount will be listed in the book's acknowledgements page (unless, of course, you're embarrassed to be seen with me!). All contributors who choose a physical perk will receive a signed Empire of Blood bookmark as well.


 
The Impact?



Contributors to this campaign can sleep with ease at night knowing they've helped solve global problems like world hunger, war, and climate change (okay, maybe actually none of that really...):
While this fundraiser is going I will be finishing up my current freelance obligations and getting what little writing I can done. If funded I will balance a very strict writing schedule with my work at Nightscape Press and finish an editor-ready draft of RISING FROM ASHES within two months of the end of this fundraiser in order to have the book edited, formatted, and ready in at least ebook format for contributors by early January. Then the process of paperback and hardcover production, ordering, signing and personalizing will take place with the goal of having all copies shipped out by the end of March at the very latest. As far as the public release goes, I have yet to decide how I will handle that. As I said earlier, a portion of these funds will go to promotion and I would like to have at least a month after the book is ready to promote it before releasing it publicly. 
Here's my prior track record as an author, editor, and publisher:
Over the past several years as a writer I have written two novels (Empire of Blood books one and two), two novellas (THE QUIET and EXIT REALITY) and over a dozen short stories for various markets and as Kindle downloads.
As an editor I have co-edited two anthologies (the Bram Stoker Award-nominated HORROR FOR GOOD: A CHARITABLE ANTHOLOGY which contributes to amfAR, the Foundation for AIDS Research and is available now, and NIGHTSCAPES VOLUME 1 which will be available soon) and solely edited one anthology (BLOOD TYPE: AN ANTHOLOGY OF VAMPIRE SF ON THE CUTTING EDGE which will contribute to The Cystic Fibrosis Trust and is due to be released on October 30th this year).
And as a publisher I have edited and released five novels (A REQUIEM FOR DEAD FLIES by Peter N. Dudar, the Bram Stoker Award-winning LIFE RAGE by L.L. Soares, DUNGEON BRAIN by Bram Stoker Award-winning author Benjamin Kane Ethridge, THE EVOLUTIONIST by Rena Mason, and STEALING NIGHT by Peter Giglio), three novellas (BUTTERFLY POTION by Nightmare Award-winning author Trent Zelazny, SUNFALL MANOR by Peter Giglio, and THE ANGEL OF SHADWELL by Jonathan Templar, and proofread and published one anthology (WORLD'S COLLIDER: A SHARED-WORLD ANTHOLOGY edited by Richard Salter). 
For those who might be interested, here is a breakdown of how the funds donated to this campain will be used:

$1,000 more or less will go to my Promotion and Production fund to cover the cost of hiring a professional editor, cover artwork, some other minor production costs, and to promote the book.
$2,000 more or less will go to paying for the production and shipping of the physical perks offered in this campaign as well as counting the cut that Indiegogo will take out. If this ends up costing more than 2k, the extra will come from my Promotion and Production fund, if it ends up costing less, more will go toward promotion.
$2,000 will go toward two months of living expenses to cover my bills and any possible materials I need during the two month stretch of finishing the final draft of the book.




Other Ways You Can Help
For those of you who cannot contribute but would like to help out:

You can tell your friends by word of mouth, sharing on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Goodreads, Livejournal, your blog, smoke writing, morse code, yelling through a bullhorn in a moving car, or live song and dance performances! 
Don't forget to make great use of the Indiegogo share tools!



You could probably pray for my immortal soul... no never mind, too late...

story:
I am an unemployed independent writer. By some standards, they're synonymous. I had a career in advertising, but was laid off and haven't found anything -- not even shit survival work in over 18 months. 

This is fine because I didn't want to do any of it anyway. I'm a writer. And so I write. I have actively maintained a blog for over three years and have managed a separate website for more feature-length pieces for over a year. 

www.terrencemoss.blogspot.com

www.terrencemoss.com

In 2010, I started an online short story series about a character named Erick Davidson based loosely on my own experiences living and working (and then just living but keeping busy) in LA. After the 200th story, I compiled them together into a colossal volume and self-published it through CreateSpace and made available on Amazon. 

But it's over 500 pages. I have pared it down to about 375 by eliminating some of the more simplistic, bloggy pieces in favor of the more sophisticated, layered pieces that resulted from the evolution of the story series itself. 

I had been working with an editor friend to help me work on the second edition but I need some funds to a) pay him for his services, b) meals and c) any necessary lodging. 

This new version will be shorter, stronger and a better representation of the story series itself.
